comments.creator: garyranford@ireland.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Thunderbird/3.1.9

have all my contacts previously stored in outlook contacts (office 2010). i have just imported the contacts into moz thunderbird, and when i open up the contact data in thunderbird all of the notes are missing. when i check back in outlook contacts the notes still exist.

the notes field is vital to my work.

i hope this is fixed soon, ive just ditched windows live email (useless product)

kindest regards

Gary

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.select tools (moz thunderbird)
2.import: select mail, next, select outlook - import !
3.check contact data in moz thunderbird, open up contact, select tools, address book, select contacts, select client, check notes, EMPTY !!!
Actual Results:  
as above

Expected Results:  
no notes, all data is missing

copied over the outlook contact data verbatum / like for like
